display.name: Power
display.description: +25% chance for Power Crystals to spawn in any chest

display.name: Challenging Bingo!
display.description: Every Challenging BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, and adds 5 stacks of Bingo Challenge, adds 20% more chance for champions, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Cursed Bingo!
display.description: Every Cursed BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, 25% soul chance, adds curses, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Explosive Bingo!
display.description: Every Explosive BINGO adds 10% item rarity and quantity, 25% soul chance, adds a stack of Grenade!, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Spooky Bingo!
display.description: Every Spooky BINGO adds 100% Soul Chance plus 1 stack of Spooky, 1 stack of Ghostly, 3 stacks of Haunting, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Fungal Bingo!
display.description: Every Fungal BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes the vault fungal,gives mobs a chance to poison!, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Electrifying Bingo
display.description: Every Electrifying BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes the vault stormy, makes mobs faster, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Freezing Bingo!
display.description: Every Freezing BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes the vault snowy!, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Burning Bingo!
display.description: Every Burning BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, makes mobs angry and hit harder, adds a stack of Burning, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Bonus Bingo!
display.description: Every Bonus BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 30%, boosts soul chance by 75%, and adds time to the vault.

display.name: Bingo!
display.description: Every BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and boosts soul quantity by 25%

display.name: Bingo!
display.description: Every subsequent BINGO Increases Item Quantity & Rarity by 10%, and boosts soul chance by 25%, and boosts your crate tier by 1!

display.name: Trial Chambers
display.description: The Trial Chambers does not contain loot, you get no experience, and you take no durability damage!

display.name: Loot Goblin
display.description: Doubles all loot and triples its rarity!

display.name: Door Hunter
display.description: Reveals all doors inside the vault!

display.name: Objective Hunter
display.description: Reveals all objective blocks inside the vault!

display.name: Nova Explosion
display.description: Killing a mob will have a high chance of casting a Nova and/or a Frost Nova on its death.

display.name: Totemic
display.description: Killing a mob has a chance of spawning a random Totem

display.name: Herald's Grace
display.description: Dying in this vault does not cause you any item loss, and this vault is of course locked.

display.name: Companion's Curse
display.description: Lowers the vault time with 2.5 minutes

display.name: Potion Curse
display.description: You drank a vanilla potion, this has upset the gods, chests have lost contents, and a minute has been removed from the vault

display.name: Companion's Challenge
display.description: Increases mob damage, mob health and mob spawns by 10% per stack, increases mob speed by 1.5% per stack

display.name: Bingo Challenge
display.description: Increases mob damage, mob health by 20% per stack, increases mob speed by 3.0% per stack, adds 7.5% critical chance to mobs per stack.

display.name: Challenge Stack
display.description: Increases mob damage, mob health and mob spawns by 10% per stack, increases mob speed by 1.5% per stack

display.name: Collapsing
display.description: This vault is cursed, it's collapsing, has less time, and wild mobs will appear

display.name: Cursed!
display.description: This Vault is Cursed, causing it to have less time

display.description: This vault is cursed, it's collapsing, void pools have appeared, some mobs are immortal & their attacks seem to have hexing effects on you!

display.description: This vault is cursed, void pools have spawned, wild mobs appears and the vault seems to not populate correctly.

display.description: This vault is cursed, there are random explosions, wild mobs appears and the vault seems to not populate correctly.
